channel.title: I re-registered
channel.description:
[font=arial]If this is allowed i would like to re-join the community for one reason... I have changed and i wish to be on good terms with everyone this time around. Davidi - im sorry about the idiot i was being last time around. EDIT: i really hate the things i said to you and about you, we have more in common than you think :) Amerika - sorry i got you banned from this forum, idk if you're even around as a registered user but i would like to attempt to make peace with you. Pure - Where'd you go bro 0.0 Anyone else i offended please tell me, for those of you who dont know who i am. I was a trolling stupid fuck who acted on the forums as a self righteous idiot, i used to be respected but on days that i got bored i fucked up and asked to be banned publicly.
I have returned to apologize if anything, if you ban me please tell me if you accept that apology. And to my friends mcbeans and charlie who set up my proxy site, i'm sorry for letting you down.
I have returned to re-gain the respect i once had as a user that helped this community.[/font]

item.title: I re-registered
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Javerfire, post:8, topic:409223”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=510500.msg3704497#msg3704497 date=1312942901]
Davidi is the only person I know on this list… What exactly did you do wrong?
[/quote]
before you registered, i made a second account after being banned once just to flame at david. i was a stupid fuck and i now really do feel bad about the things i said.[/quote]Flame is a bit of an understatement. You threatened to hack me, said you could easily do a SQL injection into the forums to retrieve my (hashed) password, something about owning a botnet to attack me, etc etc etc

Not to mention you stole programming and claimed it as your own (GML all over again, rather a coincidence you show up just a few days after he was banned? dunno :P)

You’re a compulsive liar as well, saying anything to impress

But hey, maybe you have changed. Not for me to decide. Contact an admin.

Read full topic

item.title: I re-registered
item.dc:creator: @Javerfire Javerfire
item.description:
@Javerfire wrote:

CoonHunter:

Anyways, I hope your allowed back, I always wondered what happened to ya.

ha ha well thanks bro, if i can come back i’d be happy to work with ya if you ever wanted to do somethin

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:1, topic:409225”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=510500.msg3704504#msg3704504 date=1312943029]

Davidi is the only person I know on this list… What exactly did you do wrong?

before you registered, i made a second account after being banned once just to flame at david. i was a stupid fuck and i now really do feel bad about the things i said.
[/quote]I’ve seen you round mate I was browsing the forums before I even registered O_o

I was browsing for about 1.5 years? before I registered and never really payed attention to the comment’s or name’s, I was just a leecher kid, that downloaded and hosted leeched server’s, and took tutorials and never gave credit. Yup, that was awhile ago though. I don’t do that anymore :D[/quote]
yeah you probably saw me on the general discussion alot then.

Read full topic

Anyways, I hope your allowed back, I always wondered what happened to ya.

item.title: I re-registered
item.dc:creator: @Javerfire Javerfire
item.description:
@Javerfire wrote:

ExtremeX-Scape™:

well I haven’t been here long enough to know who he is, but his name ring’s a bell, so we may have crossed path’s once or twice, welcome back. (:

i recall your name as well. thanks, that is if i am allowed to stay.

Andrew Ferguson:

Welcome back JavaFire, you were a good coder and friend before your trolling started last time. If your really turning over a new lead on the site you will have a friend in me during your time here.

thanks man, i hope we can still code some good stuff together sometime

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:12, topic:409223”]BTW: pure2ownage was banned, I forget for what.[/quote] eh i bet he was flaming someone out.

Read full topic

item.title: I re-registered
item.dc:creator: @Javerfire Javerfire
item.description:
@Javerfire wrote:

[font=arial]If this is allowed i would like to re-join the community for one reason…
I have changed and i wish to be on good terms with everyone this time around.
Davidi - im sorry about the idiot i was being last time around. EDIT: i really hate the things i said to you and about you, we have more in common than you think
Amerika - sorry i got you banned from this forum, idk if you’re even around as a registered user but i would like to attempt to make peace with you.
Pure - Where’d you go bro 0.0
Anyone else i offended please tell me, for those of you who dont know who i am. I was a trolling stupid fuck who acted on the forums as a self righteous idiot, i used to be respected but on days that i got bored i fucked up and asked to be banned publicly.

I have returned to apologize if anything, if you ban me please tell me if you accept that apology. And to my friends mcbeans and charlie who set up my proxy site, i’m sorry for letting you down.

I have returned to re-gain the respect i once had as a user that helped this community.[/font]

Read full topic
